vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.53
§ Tamah or Thamah = "laughter"
a head of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
答瑪 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "笑聲"
跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的聖殿殿役的家族領袖之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
答玛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "笑声"
跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的圣殿殿役的家族领袖之一
